2.text: The Grade 8 students of Ranpura Vidyalaya are organizing an English camp. The members of the organizing committee Saranga, Amitha, Rajeshwari and Milan have decided to meet at Saranga's house to plan it out.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The Grade 8 students of <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rɑnpurɑ'>Ranpura</phoneme> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='wid̪jālaya'>Vidyalaya</phoneme> are organizing an English camp. The members of the organizing committee <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sɑrɑŋgɑ'>Saranga</phoneme>, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ɑmit̪ɑ'>Amitha</phoneme>, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rɑd͡ʒeʃwɑri'>Rajeshwari</phoneme> and <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='milɑn'>Milan</phoneme> have decided to meet at <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sɑrɑŋgɑ'>Saranga</phoneme>'s house to plan it out.</prosody></speak>

3.text: Amitha: Hello, aunty, good afternoon! Is Saranga at home?
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ɑmit̪ɑ'>Amitha</phoneme>: Hello, aunty, good afternoon! Is <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sɑrɑŋgɑ'>Saranga</phoneme> at home?</prosody></speak>

4.text: Aunty: Good afternoon, Amitha. Yes, he's here. Please come in.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Aunty: Good afternoon, <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ɑmit̪ɑ'>Amitha</phoneme>. Yes, he's here. Please come in.</prosody></speak>

5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='milɑn'>Milan</phoneme>: Thank you, aunty.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Saranga: Hello, everybody! Why don't you sit down and make yourselves comfortable, so that we can start our discussion straightaway?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sɑrɑŋgɑ'>Saranga</phoneme>: Hello, everybody! Why don't you sit down and make yourselves comfortable, so that we can start our discussion straightaway?</prosody></speak>

7.text: Rajeshwari: Let's first discuss what we have done so far, shall we?
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rɑd͡ʒeʃwɑri'>Rajeshwari</phoneme>: Let's first discuss what we have done so far, shall we?</prosody></speak>

8.text: Milan: Well, I've already prepared the invitation cards.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='milɑn'>Milan</phoneme>: Well, I've already prepared the invitation cards.</prosody></speak>
